tidbits.title: Rich Biodiversity
tidbits.description: Gabon is known for its rich biodiversity, with vast stretches of pristine rainforests, diverse wildlife, and efforts to conserve its natural heritage.

tidbits.title: Low Human Impact
tidbits.description: Much of Gabon's landscape remains relatively untouched by human activity, contributing to its status as an ecological sanctuary in Central Africa.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country celebrates cultural diversity, with various ethnic groups, each contributing unique traditions, music, dance, and vibrant cultural expressions.
